energyProfile.generalInfo:
Performance: Configures the system to deliver peak processing speed and responsiveness by maximizing resource allocation. Recommended when using real-time applications

Balanced: Optimizes system settings to provide a good mix of performance and energy efficiency, suitable for general-purpose workloads that require responsiveness without excessive power use. Not recommended when using real-time applications
